participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Reflective and honest, often sharing personal struggles and triumphs.
participant_1.background: i now live in the city. i'm a recovering alcoholic. i take many medications and some of them make me see things. i grew up on a farm.

participant_2.name: Clara
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and energetic, with a passion for sports and a love for animals.
participant_2.background: my favorite season is winter. i won a gold medal in the 1992 olympics. i love cats and have two cats. i've a hat collection of over 1000 hats. i have a weakness for vanilla ice cream.

content.text: i am a little tired from work
